tool_description: Processes multiple images or annotations in batch operations, enabling bulk annotation creation, validation, export, and quality control with progress tracking.

project_id.description: Project identifier for batch processing context

operation_type.description: Batch operation: load_images, create_annotations, validate_annotations, or export_data

input_data.description: Input data for batch processing (paths, IDs, or configurations)

batch_size.description: Number of items to process per batch

error_handling.description: Error handling strategy: continue, stop_on_error, or skip_errors

progress_callback.description: Whether to provide progress updates during processing

error_messages: Invalid project_id: Project identifier must exist and be non-empty. Verify project_id is correct.
Invalid operation_type: Operation must be one of [load_images, create_annotations, validate_annotations, export_data]. Check operation_type.
Empty input_data: At least one input item is required for batch processing. Provide data in input_data array.
Invalid batch_size: Batch size must be a positive integer between 1 and 100. Adjust batch_size value.
Invalid parallel_workers: Worker count must be a positive integer between 1 and 10. Adjust parallel_workers value.
Invalid error_handling: Strategy must be one of [continue, stop_on_error, skip_errors]. Check error_handling parameter.
usage: Provide project_id, operation_type, and input_data array. Configure batch_size, parallel_workers, and error_handling for optimal processing. Enable progress_callback for real-time updates. Returns batch processing results and statistics.

failed_items.description: Number of items that failed processing

error_summary.description: Summary of errors encountered during processing

batch_completion_status.description: Overall completion status of the batch operation
